body_html:
It's not the same issue as the one in stackoverflow.com.
Actually, you will find tensorflow already defined " -pthread -Wl,-no-as-needed" in the build script. I think this issue is caused by tensorflow did not add -lrt in the build script.
body_text:
It's not the same issue as the one in stackoverflow.com.
Actually, you will find tensorflow already defined " -pthread -Wl,-no-as-needed" in the build script. I think this issue is caused by tensorflow did not add -lrt in the build script.
body:
It's not the same issue as the one in stackoverflow.com. 
Actually, you will find tensorflow already defined " -pthread -Wl,-no-as-needed" in the build script. I think this issue is caused by tensorflow did not add -lrt in the build script.
